title.narrative: Strategic Sector Cooperation on Health Between Denmark and Vietnam, Phase II

description.narrative:
Key results: • Support for strengthening national policy dialogue on development and implementation of primary healthcare for Non-communicable diseases • Strengthening of primary healthcare in Thai Binh province, focused on prevention, early detection and management of treatment of non-communicable diseases. Hereby generating experiences at local level to be applied in the national policy dialogue on primary health care reform. • Improve quality of diabetes and hypertension related health services at selected Commune Health Stations in the Thai Binh province, including the engagement of Village Health Workers and selected community based organisations.
To strengthen primary healthcare in Vietnam for prevention, detection and management of treatment of non-communicable diseases by supporting the development of policies, plans, guidelines and implementation of a pilot in Thai Binh province
